    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Creates a new row in the COUPON table, containing all coupon's data.
      void deleteCoupon(long coupon_id)
      Delete's a row in the COUPON table, where COUPON.id = coupon_id.
      void deleteCouponFromCustCoup(long coupon_id)
      Deletes one row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table where CUSTOMER_COUPON.coupon_id=coupon_id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> readAllCoupons()
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects from the COUPON table containing all coupons.
      Coupon readByName(java.lang.String title)
      A method which reads a Coupon object from the database by searching for its name, i.e title.
      Coupon readCoupon(long coupon_id)
      Returns a Coupon object containing all data in the COUPON table, where COUPON.id=coupon_id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> readCouponsByDate(java.util.Date endDate)
      A method to Read all coupons that their End_Date is equal to or below a certain date.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> readCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      Returns a Collection of Coupon objects from the COUPON table containing all coupons where COUPON.type=type.
      void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Updates all data in the COUPON table where COUPON.id=coupon.id, to coupon's data.

        public void deleteCouponFromCustCoup(long coupon_id)
                              throws ApplicationException
        Description copied from interface: CouponDAO
        Deletes one row in the CUSTOMER_COUPON join table where CUSTOMER_COUPON.coupon_id=coupon_id. Should be used when a coupon is deleted from the system, to delete it from all customers' accounts.
        Specified by:
